review: Works great! Wonderful purchase. Easy to use.
author: Melissa Holmquist

review: I have enjoyed some movies, but there were no instructions on how to find various programs it advertises.  I'm still learning.
author: Wanda Hines

review: I love love love it. I can see new released movies, tv shows. It is totally portable so I can take it to a friends house for movie night. Good deal, well worth your money.
author: Glenda

review: It kind of took control of my TV.  At times while watching regular TV it would switch over to the wi-fi menu.  Weird
author: Ronald C. Richtsmeier

review: To think that this little thing allows me to watch Amazon Prime movies and other programs, once watched only on my iPad, on my big screen TV!!!!  It is great and I love it.
author: TLaw

review: The product seems to assume I know what it does.  There needs to be a summary of what you get at various levels.  The product seems only motivated to have me spend $99 to join Prime.  I am not going to spend $99 to figure out what your product does, you should tell me.
author: larry ritter
